content: the beginner friendly easy ripple baby blanket crochet pattern is a very popular choice of many crocheters these blankets wrap loved ones in coziness they serve as delightful presents for baby showers birthdays or when you want to make something for someone special far from mundane the ripple designs also known as a chevron blanket come together rapidly resulting in a crochet blanket that boasts a stunning striped motif this free crochet pattern showcases an identical series of elegant waves on both sides of the blanket this pattern includes three finish size options along with the stitch multiple so you can make any size blanket or afghan you desire baby 30 x 30 child or lapghan 38 x 38 throw 38 x 54 the pattern is free on the website if you prefer an ad free pdf you can find that in our etsy shop https //patternprincessetsy etsy com/listing/1529543911/quick-and-easy-crochet-blanket-crochet utm_source=copy&utm_medium=listingmanager&utm_campaign=share&utm_term=so lmsm&share_time=1691689634096
